creator: Codex7 Games
descriptionHtml:
Puzzle Warriors is a match-3 game combining hero card collection. Take action to reawaken fearless heroes and unite them to battle the evil. Start your epic adventure and become the legend of this puzzle land.

KEY FEATURES:

* Play with an immersive RPG experience.
* Collect and evolve hundreds of hero cards, each with their own breath-taking visual.
* Build your army of heroes, power up to unlock their special skills, refine the gears, prepare yourself to command the puzzles battlefield to a final victory.
* Farm resources when you are away from your device. Come back and harvest on time.
* Join a guild or be friend with other adventurers around the world, support each other in the fight against evil monsters, or hunt for treasure in the bounty missions.
* Battle your way to dominance of the dark dungeon, take on big challenges and earn better quest rewards.
* Participate in special events, earn trophies to climb up the ranking for the glory and bigger prizes.

Puzzle Warriors is a puzzle RPG game. Practice your skill, use strategy and teamwork to win the battles. We are constantly improving the game. In case of any problems, please do contact us at support@codex7.cn
descriptionShort: Play with an immersive RPG experience in Puzzle Warriors!

appDetails.developerAddress: N2-404,18 Haitaixi Road, Tianjin, China
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Ver 0.1.2
This version includes:
* Improved the effect when clear power gems.
* Displays the damage an ally deal in the battles of King of Legend.
* Optimized the menu navigation.
* Improved the game efficiency.
* Fixed the re-connection problem when lossing connection in the middle of the game.
* Fixed the button problem on the guild information page.
* Some other issues fixed.

* Optimized the Ranking.
* Strengthened the effect of quick raid in the Enhanced Zone.
* Fixed the dis-connection problem in King of Legend events.
* Other bug fixes and optimizations for a better performance.

appDetails.developerAddress:
PO Box 173
Road Town, Tortola
British Virgin Islands
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Myth of War is open, time limited hero of this term: Knight of War.
2. Adjusted effects of some artifacts and difficulty of the Trial.
3. Added main quest rewards for 40+ chapters.
4. Lineup used in battles will be recorded and automatically applied next time.
5. 5-Star Hero shards: collect 15→60 to summon a hero. Now there is very high chance to get Myth card.
6. Packages of game store optimized and rebalanced.
7. Other optimizations and bugs fixed.

Puzzle Warriors is a match-3 game combining hero card collection. Take action to reawaken fearless heroes and unite them to battle the evil. Start your epic adventure and become the legend of this puzzle land.

KEY FEATURES:

* Play with an immersive RPG experience, use strategy and teamwork to win battles.
* Collect and evolve hundreds of hero cards, each with their own breath-taking visual.
* Build your hero decks, power up to unlock special skills, refine the gears, prepare yourself to command the puzzles battlefield to a final victory.
* Farm resources when you are away from your device. Come back and harvest on time.
* Join a guild or be friend with other adventurers around the world, support each other in the fight against evil monsters, or hunt for treasure in the expedition.
* Battle your way to dominance of the dark dungeon, take on big challenges and earn better quest rewards.
* Participate in special events, earn trophies to climb up the ranking for the glory and bigger prizes.

We are constantly improving the game. In case of any problems, please contact us at support@codex7.cn.

#Follow us on Facebook for latest news and community events:
https://www.facebook.com/puzzlewarriors

#Join our Discord official server:
https://discord.gg/e9GDqnquDr
descriptionShort: Match orbs and collect characters in the most addictive Puzzle RPG!

appDetails.developerAddress:
PO Box 173
Road Town, Tortola
British Virgin Islands
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Acquire your designated heroes from the new Miracle Summon.
2. Added new item [Myth Book]. Use it to summon designated heroes.
3. Adjusted skill effects for all myth heroes.
4. Improved Earth faction (myth heroes only).
5. Optimized the auto-battle.
6. Optimized recommendations when selects a support from allies.
7. Adjusted items in the trial store and the elite arena store.
8. Optimized rankings, added instructions for rankings.
9. Fixed known issues.

appDetails.developerAddress:
PO Box 173
Road Town, Tortola
British Virgin Islands
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Added a new gameplay Elemental Tower (access from The Spire)
2. Added the opening animation
3. Opens a new round of Hero Enhancement event. Added two new Myth heroes: Forest Ranger (Earth faction) and Goddess of Wisdom (Light faction)
4. 5 new regular challenge events will be opened in a loop
5. Cards with 3 stars or above can be sold now
6. Adjusted the selling list of Merchant in the Trial
7. Added new Legend Pass
8. Other known issues fixed and features improved

appDetails.developerAddress:

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this update:
1. Participate in the Halloween Party with abundant rewards
2. Added new Resonance Heroes - 5 Lord Gods
3. Added main quests related to Elemental Tower
4. Adjusted rewards for monthly cards
5. Adjustments to King of Legend: reduced the requirement of attempts for receiving daily chests; consumption of 3 guild tickets in one battle counts as 3 attempts now.
6. Several bug fixes and performance improvements
